Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: MNM
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I have bought this camera and I love it!, It works great underwater, in the ocean and pool, takes great videos. Works great under snow and freezing weather. the only con is night time pictures are not that great, they always end up spotted. But other than that it's a great camera if you like to travel.

ProductInfo.Features:
14-megapixel CCD sensor; 5x wide-angle optical zoom
Rugged design is waterproof, shockproof, freezeproof, and dustproof
GPS Geo-tagging function; easy Web upload to Facebook and YouTube
HD video capture; 720p with sound at 30 frames per second with one-touch ease
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix XP30 14 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with Fujinon 5x Optical Zoom Lens and GPS Geo-Tagging Function (Silver)
